alert.note: Alert for Goshen County; Niobrara County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued May 09 at 3:27PM MDT until May 09 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 60 mph. * WHERE...In Wyoming, Niobrara County and Goshen County. In Nebraska, Northern Sioux County, Southern Sioux County, Box Butte County and Dawes County. * WHEN...Until 9 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
